name: Plant Chaos
description:
Keep all the plants alive for as long as possible. Move the sun around to keep all of them alive,  or the watering can.

This a short game I made in about a week. Hope you enjoy!   :)

To play drag and drop the sun and watering can into the boxes to sustain their needs.

Made using:

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Krita
  • BFXR
  • LMMS
  • Lospec

Color pallet for itch page: lospec.com/acidic-gb

Note: If you find any bugs, please contact me in the comments.
